[City Council Archive of Agendas & Minutes, 2013-2019](https://www.cityofgroesbeck.com/page/city.meetings_archive)

Groesbeck's City Council meets regularly every 3rd Tuesday of each month at 6:00 PM. The Meetings are held in the Council Chamber at 317 W. Navasota.  
  
To have an item placed on the City Council Agenda see: [Agenda Request Form](https://www.cityofgroesbeck.com/upload/page/0056/docs/Agenda%20Item%20Request2013-%20Form.pdf).

**Note:**Agenda Request must be received at the City Secretary's Office by 4:00 PM on the Tuesday prior to the scheduled meeting.  
Request received after that will be held and scheduled for the following meeting.  
  
**Public Comment:**   
Citizens are provided an opportunity to make comments at the beginning of every Council Meeting. Citizens will be required to   
fill out a speakers request form and turn it into the City secretary prior to the time the issue is called by the Mayor  
Comments do not require Council response and are limited to a five minute presentation.   
  
**City Council Agenda's are listed below**
